about_the_game:
9 Days brings a psychological horror experience where you play as a father. One time, someone kidnaps your child, and The kidnapper asks for money if he wants his child safe. In the end, you must find a way to make money as fast as possible and try to survive by hiding from them.

Synopsis :
You play as Chris William a Father who loves his Daughter. One time, someone kidnapped your daughter. The kidnapper asks for money if he wants the child safe. So he goes to the gambling site and does a gambling to make more money. He knew that he needed more, so he borrowed from online loans and got chased by debt collectors.

Features :

EXPLORE

Explore the house to find the truth behind the kidnapper.

SURVIVE

Hide from the enemy and don't let them catch you while clearing all objectives.

PC

Use a Personal Computer to get more money from gambling sites.

Smartphone

Get an online loan and search for help.

name: Nine Days

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10, 64-bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-530
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB VRAM, NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1560 / AMD RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10, 64-bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1.5GB VRAM, NVIDIA Geforce RTX 2070 Super / Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

short_description: 9 Days brings a psychological horror experience where you play as a father. One time, someone kidnaps your child, and The kidnapper asks for money if he wants his child safe. In the end, you must find a way to make money as fast as possible and try to survive by hiding from them.
